website_summaries.verdict: A healthy blend of 18 vitamins and minerals makes this powder a good choice to supercharge your diet.
pros: 100% vegan-friendly formula uses a combination of vegetables, sprouts, grains, and fruits
Provides a number of recommended vitamins and nutrients in a single pack
Good for healthy desserts and beverages
cons: Some ingredient flavors stand out in the aftertaste

customer_reviews.title: DO YOUR RESEARCH!
customer_reviews.text: Society wonders why "cancer" is an issue today and so wide spread; the search is with the food and drug administration, all kinds of chemicals are added to our food that is harmful to the body but is allowed in small doses to be added in products for human consumption. Silicon Dioxcide is one of the ingredients found in this product. I have canceled my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: alida arnao

customer_reviews.title: Here are clear pictures of the ingredient label
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t read the label on Amazon, so here it is for anyone interested.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cereal milk good
customer_reviews.text: As people have stated, it does have a slight funky after taste and the way that I have described it, is that it's similar to when you're done eating cereal in a bowl and you're left with the milk; it literally tastes like cereal milk. It may take a few days or months to get use to but I enjoy the way it makes me feel throughout the day. If you can't tolerate the taste, I would suggest mixing it in a smoothie -or put it in your double shot of whiskey to stop your whining and complaining.
customer_reviews.author: DamienVonDoom

customer_reviews.title: no contact information
customer_reviews.text: too sweet, no contact information on label, very suspect to me. I prefer to do business with a company which is proud of displaying their info on the label. Also - it states; "Ultra-Convenient - Add to your shakes, drink on its own or add to soups or sauces" When I first tried it, not realizing your product is sickeningly sweet, I did add a scoop to my bowl of soup. One 'slurp' and down the dispose-all it went. My veggie broth with veggies don't mix well with stevia, or any other sweetner
customer_reviews.author: MMCC

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet for me. I will not be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake and ordered the wrong stuff. I can hardly get this down it is way too sweet it mixes well and has all the other ingredients that are good but the Stevia makes it taste Way too sweet for me. I will not be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good product that is loaded to the max with vitamins and minerals which are essential. It is all pure ingredients in this and no other product matches it! The taste isn't too bad, just takes a couple times to get used to. I would use less water over using more water because it would be easier to take down. I would notice slight increase in daily energy and well being. I would recommend this to anyone trying to just improve daily health and to intake good amount of nutrients that could be lacking from their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like others
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several different brands of these drinks and this one is by far the worst. The taste is good, fruity, however, unlike the others, it left me hungry. Not full. The drink is grainy. Don't waste your money with this one. There are others in this price range that work way better.
customer_reviews.author: Supastar808

customer_reviews.title: For the price? Just do it.
customer_reviews.text: First off, to the one star about silicone dioxide and doing your own research... Silicone dioxide is a natural ingredient found in various fruits and vegetables and on an ingredient list it goes by quantity. So being the last ingredient, it is the smallest additive to the product. 2nd, I am moving into day 4 with this product. It blows my mind on the price and if it stars there, I'll buy 3 a month. I'm drinking it twice a day (before and after my active day) and my energy is on point. My mind is clear and I woke up today 4 hours early and I feel more alert than I have in awhile. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Cole

customer_reviews.title: Folic Acid
customer_reviews.text: This product states that it has folic acid in it which I do not understand. Folic acid is a lab created molecular altered petroleum from what I have studied. It is toxic to anyone with MTHFR gene mutation and definitely not organic. I am not sure if this is a packaging error and the product packagers do not know that folate or methyl folate is the term for the live, organic B vitamin or if they added Folic acid to the product which then makes me wonder how accurate any of it is.
customer_reviews.author: ANna

customer_reviews.title: 1 star is too many
customer_reviews.text: I could not get past the taste a natural sweetener with a nasty aftertaste. I would never buy this product again and will throw out the remaining after using only one scoop a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kitts

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet, full of stevia and just little bit of good ingredients. Bought once and no more.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo Slice

customer_reviews.title: Didnt notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product. Firstly its pricey, second its only 8oz. I had to laugh when it had on the label 20% more like it was a bonus size. Then if that wasn't on the label what would I have got a cup? I didn't notice any more energy, didn't fill me up . Really no change at all . so wont order again
customer_reviews.author: kim marsh

customer_reviews.title: Read in ingredient label first!
customer_reviews.text: I looked forward to receiving this, but it was disgustingly sweet--really bad. When I read the "other ingredients" list, I saw why the taste was so sweet. It contains stevia--which until recently I used in my coffee, but research in multiple locations now shows stevia and all artificial sweeteners fool the body--blood glucose doesn't rise, but insulin definitely does, and that is the hormone that makes fat--explains why I couldn't lose weight when using it. Now I am, and wish I had known sooner. But at any rate, this "healthy" drink shouldn't have sweeteners in it, and I will have to throw it away. Dieters and diabetics should be aware before buying. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced 1/2 quantity
customer_reviews.text: First impression nice. Open the seal and found 1/2 of content in the container. This was very disappointing. I should have paid 1/2 price. Poor representation of this product just be ware.
customer_reviews.author: DevonnaM3001

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: To address a previous negative review regarding the presence of silcon dioxide(silica). Silica is naturally occurring mineral that is often present in plant-life. It is known to have cognitive and other health benefits. It is not toxic if ingested, however if you do not take as directed and instead through a $100 bill you may experience adverse health effects(specifically respiratory). As far as product is concerned the ingredients are vast and comparable to the more expensive options. It is very sweet. Just use more water and it is plenty palatable. It seems any supplement sweetened with stevia is really sweet.. All in all great value, safety sealed and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jonolden

customer_reviews.title: Contains stevia... gross
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping for a product that was all-natural and unsweetened to add some veggies to my fruit smoothies. The front of the canister clearly states no artificial sweeteners or flavors. After tasting my first smoothie with this product, I knew something was amiss. What was that cloyingly sweet flavor that was hiding the taste of my berries and bananas? After careful inspection, I finally found the culprit. Listed under "other ingredients" there are two items that stem from 'organic stevia leaf extract'. I guess because it's not 'artificial' then the company is within their rights to claim it wasn't an 'artificial sweetener'. I still feel like I've been cheated, though. It tastes like stevia and it's so gross.
customer_reviews.author: Dori K

customer_reviews.title: Not what it appears to be
customer_reviews.text: The product does not taste bad however you are only receiving half a container. I received my package on Mother’s Day and just opened it to see half of the contents empty. If I pay for this many ounces either shorten the container or fill the container to the rim and charge the cost for a full container.
customer_reviews.author: Very hard working mother!

customer_reviews.title: I feel great
customer_reviews.text: I take this with Lion's Mane powder, coconut milk and either frozen blueberries or mango...a delicious smoothie. Very versatile and l can easily add other tasty bits like ginger and cardamom. I always use a small battery operated blender that can be taken to work. This makes me feel great. I really do not notice any green taste, it has a mild flavor and is quite satisfying. I bought this product because it is quality, affordable and made by a reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: CM King

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried a green supplement before and thought I would give this a shot. I must admit I never get enough greens in my body. I read the ingredients and wanted to give it a shot. First off, you will taste the veggies. It was kinda wired at first, because I'm use to eating them and not drinking. The taste wasn't bad and it mix easily. I can say that after a week of drinking it I did notice a boost of energy. Now it wasn't enough to go hit some weights in the gym but it helps during the day at work. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard T.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know what it is sweetened with but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it is sweetened with but it tastes nasty when drunk on its own (just water). It also has an awful color. Maybe with some flavored thing it would work, but I think it’ll afftect the color and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kitszanaweh Ibsen

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's a bad batch, but this powder is disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a bad batch, but this powder is disgusting. It's sweet, like mint chewing gum, as has a horrible after taste. It ruined my 5# batch of protein powder I added it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Great Greens and more!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent way to get the servings of fruits and vegetables we need daily. It is a vegan formula too. I make smoothies with this, tastes good. A great way to start your day!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's contains very good vitamins and greens
customer_reviews.text: My mother had colon cancer and she was only suposed to take liquids, I was able to feed her this product in her liquids for 3 months and it was the only thing she was able to take. It had all the vitamin she could get. The taste was very good
customer_reviews.author: mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality organic love this :)))
customer_reviews.text: This is great organic packed into all one amazing mix . It’s working for me I can feel the difference minute after very powerful mix of ingredients I can feel like my energy level is great I can do things usually I feel down on my batteries a little later in the day but when I drink this my mental clarity makes the difference. I am taking other multiple supplements like liquid Multi, calc, iron, vit c, but when I narrowed down to one thing that is working for me is THIS I don’t know if it the organic ingredients in this or like the Vit&min mix but it’s a god sent .I am happy I bought it, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I buy this on subscribe and save- I love it! I wasn’t sure how the flavor was going to be and I hesitated with the first swallow, but I was pleasantly surprised! It has 40 calories but it’s all organic and it has a nice sweet flavor without added sugars. Only downfall for me is that I wish it came in a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just mix this with water and drink it straight. It's definitely an acquired taste, but I feel healthier since I have started drinking this every day. Also, I have been surrounded by people who have flu b due to our being flu season (including my kids who have coughed directly in my face not even 1 foot away while sick) and I haven't gotten sick. I can't say it's a direct result from this product, but I'm sure it helped.
customer_reviews.author: SaraSota

customer_reviews.title: Lots of nutritious ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I use this to improve my diet as I don't like vegetables very much. The serving size is very small and easy to tolerate mixed with a little water or in a smoothie. It also has fruit, seeds, and wheat grass, among many other nutritious things. It is sweet and not hard to tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Amzoony

customer_reviews.title: Empty bottle...dont buy. ..shoppers beware.
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this item roday and I thought I was going to get a great full product to have not half of the bottle. Im highly disappointed for the money spent and given half the amount of powder the powder is only filled halfway as if someone scooped a lot out and left the rest. Enough said..wont be buying again. You shouldn't either.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: OK product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product. My only problem is in the fact that when powder is below 2/3's of container I can't get my hand inside to dig out any more. Product must be placed into another container that is more easily accessible. Product needs to be in something with a wide mouth so that I am not holding the little scoop with my index and second finger tips trying to reach bottom of container. Container only needs to be half as tall with wider mouth.
customer_reviews.author: mousehound369

customer_reviews.title: Not very green
customer_reviews.text: This should be called Organic Grains, as these are it’s real ingredients. I haven’t tested it for gluten yet, but will do so soon. Hard to imagine they use truly gluten free millet.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Sebastian Tello

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of boosted Almond milk
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sweet. I use unsweetened original almond milk and I prefer the "grass grit" taste and this is not that. It is super sweet to me and I barely taste the vitamins and minerals. I am use to Greens+ brand that is more robust in it quality and quantity. The value for what is in it is great, however it is just not my cup of boosted Almond milk if you know what I mean lol for those who are new to greens and desire sweet/flavored/unflavored this powder us definitely for you!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Organic greens
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has no flavor. I can add it to my baking, smoothies, food, etc. and get my daily dose of greens. I give it to my kids and they don't notice the difference ;)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Corripio

customer_reviews.title: Organic Greens
customer_reviews.text: A great supplement to take daily. Usually I don't like these kind of drinks because of the taste but this one doesn't bother me and I actually like the taste of it. The main reason why I would recommend this product other than the nutritional values and health benefits is because of the convenience. It's so easy and quick to just make some first thing in the morning before your out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Effective but flavor is too sweet
customer_reviews.text: These are a great way of getting your greens in, but the flavor is sickeningly sweet. I made the mistake of assuming it would taste bitter by itself, so I added honey to it. My first drink was so sweet it made me gag. But, if its too sweet, try putting lemon juice in, that helped balance the sweetness for me. This is a good product, just wish they could do something about the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko Long

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was more than half full
customer_reviews.text: I would most likely buy this item again. It went well with pretty much anything. I used it in hot tea, hot chocolate, orange juice. I even drank it straight up with water and it tasted fine. I just wish that there was a full container of the powder rather than it being half full. It reminded me of how a potato chip bag is half full of air, and half of chips. LOL. The only other negative I could say was it didn't blend well. Many times I had to re-shake/re-stir to blend the powder back into the liquid, but other than it was a pretty good item. And a saving grace for me on those early mornings.
customer_reviews.author: A. Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully healthy
customer_reviews.text: This "Purely Inspired Organic Super Greens Powder with Superfoods & Multivitamins" is OK as an additive. It smells horrible and doesn't taste that great, but the taste grows on you. It's still not a great smell, but you get used to it. (I'm adding this powder to another drink to make that drink healthier, not to make it tastier.)
customer_reviews.author: M(400HV) C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Unflavored... But it's greens powder so it's expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this greens powder everyday... The sweet after taste is not so great, if I'm drinking greens powder I'd rather have a nice grass flavor.. haha But with that said I do see the benefits of drinking this in my skin, digestion and weightloss. Now this is not a weight loss remedy, I just drink the greens before my largest meal for the day and it helps me feel full faster ultimately helping me eat less. I'm not telling anyone to use it to lose weight this is just how I use it. I think it's a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but it's got a ton of sweetener in it! Greens are greens; they're going to taste earthy. Unless you use this powder. Then, the just taste like candy that someone dropped on the ground. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible/ Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm SORRY to have to write a bad review, but I couldn't even get the first sip down. Almost throw-in. Taste and consistency was terrible! Because of COVID I'm not able to go out to return it. I'm very HIGH RISK, so I'm stuck with it, I threw it away, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, if without the Stevia
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for mixing in with some pea protein and to aid in your sluggish digestive tract. I would love this product more if the Stevia was left out (just keeping plain for us to sweeten with our own preference), as I’m highly allergic to it. Plus, I prefer adjusting my sweetness to much less than most people require. Maybe the company could offer a non sweetened one as other brands do. You can’t beat the price, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: popcornfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: So sweet it's not palatable , even mixed with other food, misadvertised because it says no artificial sweeteners but fails to say it's loaded with stevia.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope its really have all it said it have. And I hoped its organic
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this product us so cheap and so good. High quality products and organic. Get 2 because it's a really small bottle not too small lol. Good quality and gives me alot of energy. People complained about it too sweet and if it's not sweet enough people complainIt about it too. Every taste buds are different. Apreciate what you have. It have just the right amount of sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Decent supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Read the nutrition facts well. I was surprised to see most nutrients only met 25% of the daily value needed.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I have added this to my morning fruit smoothie’s, it tastes great! I have tried mixing it in orange juice, tastes wonderful. I love it! It gives me the boost I need in the mornings! Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda~*

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have gone green.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I like the way it tastes and the way it looks. I also like that compared to other expensive ones it has good merit. I enjoy putting it in all sorts of liquids. I believe the powder is going to help me. I will have to review it again for further details and outcomes. I would repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very small container! Jar only half full when open
customer_reviews.text: Update** The taste is good. I’m so happy it’s not overly sweet or grainy like others I’ve tried! Wish I would’ve scrolled down further and seen the reviews about size! First of all the container is tiny. Which is ok because the price wasn’t too bad. But wait til you open it, it’s half empty!!! Shocked. Feel shortchanged for sure. Taste is just ok. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: CORNSTARCH..
customer_reviews.text: Loaded with cornstarch! Settles on the bottom, so you can clearly see it. Bummer... I've been using for a long g time and my daughter discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: StraightSkinny

customer_reviews.title: HEALTH HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: This item with a rubber or latex glove inside it and half the powder missing DO NOT BUY HEALTH HAZARD DANGER
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organic greens is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Organic Greens has turned my life around. I was tired, cranky, depressed and in pain most of the time. I admit that I did not eat healthy. I started drinking this in a smoothie. After just a few days I started feeling better. Now I will not go a day without my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J Hallas

customer_reviews.title: Came missing HALF of the product!
customer_reviews.text: The container came only half way filled! I bought two and they BOTH were ONLY HALF FILLED. Tastes okay. I bought to put in smoothies but the machine that fills the containers must do a very bad job measuring... or there was a whole bad batch?? Either way, I wouldn't recomend buy this because you might not get all that you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. T.

customer_reviews.title: Good in a morning smoothie
customer_reviews.text: The Good: It's not too sweet or maybe I can't tell because i don't mix mine with water or almond milk alone. I put it in my Ninja with tons of other stuff and my smoothies taste great! The not good: It smells weird compared to other green/veggie mixes I've used. That's not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Need to fill the container
customer_reviews.text: Ther was half a container of powder in the can ,I know some things settle but not that much.other container was filled up ,but not this container, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: p.love

customer_reviews.title: Tried before... Hope it hasn't changed.
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this as I had tried it from a sample he gave me. Pretty good stuff. Want to see how it works overall. Hopefully the formulation has not changed and it makes as well with my fruit, additional greens, or any liquids that I use. Will give an update soon!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my smoothy every morning. It has a good consistency and I can't taste it when mixed in with everything. I only wish more came in the jar. Seems they only fill it about half way. Great product though, and a good way to get extra greens and vitamins in your diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I love the way it tastes and makes me feel. My favorite ways to have it are with vanilla almond milk or mixed with my protein shake! If I have it with almond milk I save it for after dinner because it is sweet enough to be a "dessert" for me. I have repurchased this so many times it truly is a favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Item . this is my second order.
customer_reviews.text: Taste great alone. but can be added to smoothies , juice soup, etc... Without over powering it. very subtle taste and not a lot of grit like some other brands. I used to buy at my grocery store. but it seems people are finding out how good it is and buying it all...
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD TASTE
customer_reviews.text: It tastes ok for unflavored version, not too grassy. However, I wish this was made in a chocolate version. I used to buy Delicious Greens 8000 which has chocolate, so maybe I'm spoiled. But it still is pretty good mixed into my veggie juice.
customer_reviews.author: Zizi

customer_reviews.title: Ho-Hum
customer_reviews.text: Don't care for this product. It may be good for me but the taste was a little offensive. I have a can sitting here which I may eventually use but don't look forward to it. But don't let me discourage you from trying it. I just don't personally care for it.
customer_reviews.author: wesviking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My husband and I are on our second can and we love this stuff! I add it to my coffee in the morning and can’t taste a thing until I get to the very bottom of the cup! We also add it to our protein shakes on our work our days and you can’t taste in there either!
customer_reviews.author: Jojorich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. You can actually feel the energy in your body and overall wellness. It really is delicious. I like to mix this product (Organic Greens) with ensure powder, since I am dieting and let me say that it makes dieting extremely easy. :)
customer_reviews.author: A.Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is unflavored and I can add it to my chocolate shake! Cant taste it at all which is great and I'm getting extra veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Frey

customer_reviews.title: I'm very picky and I like this
customer_reviews.text: I mix this into chocolate smoothies I make. The chocolate powder I add is definitely the most prominent flavor, but the taste of this is a much welcomed one. This is the only product I am subscribed to on Amazon. It's cheaper on here than I've found in any store.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Artificial sweetener taste
customer_reviews.text: I definitely felt fuller and more satiated throughout the day after I added this to a smoothie. However, the sweetness of it was too much. Not that it was too sweet, but it tasted too much like artificial sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Repse

customer_reviews.title: its green and powdery, and probably has good stuff in it? Who can really be sure.
customer_reviews.text: Well its definitely green. I haven't tasted it yet but I'm sure it tastes like something. It didn't come with any water so I'm not really sure if I'm supposed to just eat spoonfuls of it or snort it or what but ill try some different methods and see whats up.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I wouldn't like the taste but it's not bad at all and not too sweet. I mix it with orange juice and it's even better.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, no funny veggie or grassy taste.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to review this, cause I am not sure if they really work or not. There is no real way to tell if you're getting all your veggies. Overall taste is good, I put it in my shake every day, there is not a big grassy or veggie taste. I will continue to buy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walls

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick on a pig 🐷
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste , very gritty to the point of choking . Lots of what I believe to be psyllium or sand idk 🤷🏾‍♂️ , that's left behind in the glass . Not what I expected , which was powdered fruits and vegetables . If I were to guess I would estimate 90 % psyllium and green dye , and lord knows what else . "I do not have any proof that this is the case , these opinions reflect my own personal experience with the product."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and taste!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. This brand cost’s much more in my local store. I’m a huge fan of all Purely Inspired products. They use all natural, organic, high quality ingredients. This has a great taste and no bloating.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it for what it is, but the sweetness is artificial-tasting and off-putting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hook

customer_reviews.title: Don't smell, just drink
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the sweet Stevia flavor on top of my greens flavor...definitely helps! But don't smell before you drink. Either chug it or hold your breath. Wish they had bigger containers to buy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... tried a lot of greens and this is the best tasting one that I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of greens and this is the best tasting one that I've ever had. Most of them you have to choke down or mix with something else to kill the taste. I mix the Purely Inspired with just water and it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty  good
customer_reviews.text: It’s quite good, can’t really distinguish it from other green products on the market. Would consider buying again depending on price. Pro tip: put in freezer for a tastier blend in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: joãozinho

customer_reviews.title: Taste like baby formula
customer_reviews.text: The price was good so I thought it was worth a try. I wasn’t expecting it to taste great or even good but I didn’t expect it to make me gag. It was in drinkable and taste a lot like baby formulae. Yuck
customer_reviews.author: Jhicks75

customer_reviews.title: Only half full... Difficult to get product
customer_reviews.text: Good product yet it should be in a smaller container half it's size. Only less than half full which is misleading AND the spoon is very small. This makes it difficult to get the product. Smaller package with wider mouth and longer spoon is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher (PapaBear)

customer_reviews.title: WHERE'S MY 20% MORE??????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
customer_reviews.text: My 2 containers must be old, does not contain 20% more!!!! False advertising
customer_reviews.author: JustHarry

customer_reviews.title: Even my dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: This has a pleasant smell and very little taste. I mix it with my protein shake: can hardly tell a change in taste of shake. My dogs love veggies. I mix with water and pour a little in with their dog food. It makes a healthy gravy flavor for them: they eat it up!!
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: Too much Stevia!
customer_reviews.text: For someone who doesn't consume sweets this product tastes very sweet. It's sweetened with Stevia and it seems to be too much. I just want an unsweetened greens product with no added natural or added sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love this mix. It's not powdery when mixed into smoothies or drinks. Not super vitaminy taste wise. Easy to hide in any drink. Gives me energy in the mornings or after work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great value when mixed with protein for complete meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Personally i love garden of life raw meal. But this mixed with the same brand of plant protein is a great substitute when you can get the two of them, or this and another plant protein mix on sale. Graassy/green flavor, some may not like it, but i find it to taste very fresh and light. It is not medicinal or offensive at all....and after a few days you'll start to crave it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste yummy
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So im a very low carb person..i Really do not eat veggies - like at all...so i was looking for a way to get all the needed nourishment fast and ez... So i decided to try this out.. I bascially put it in a blender with water and about a shot of jalapeño/pickle juice (i need the electrolytes).. It is sooooooo yummy !!! Great taste.. Assuming my tummy likes it..ill keep drinking it and order again
customer_reviews.author: Nunya biznas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drink, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I just mix a scoop with a cup or two or water in a bottle and shake it up...mixes easily, doesn’t have a strong taste, and doesn’t effect my stomach (sensitive with IBS). I will be reordering when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Okay it’s a medium taste
customer_reviews.text: I received this after a month. But I’m happy. Thanks The taste is not easy to pass. But it’s good for you so. I add this to juices, smoothies, and you can drink it alone with just water. Better with less liquid so you drink it fast
customer_reviews.author: Carmen V.

customer_reviews.title: Great super green powder.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the extremely subtle flavor of these greens as opposed to the Orgain brand, which is hard for me to say because I love Orgain too. I feel good about adding this product to my smoothie daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory Product
customer_reviews.text: Completely dissatisfying and disappointing, first it toke almost a month to get the product because the first time it got lost so I had to reordered it again, then second and most important, I literally open up the product and it was half way filled, even known I weighted and it's only 2 oz short from the 8.6 that it supposed to have, I'm not exaggerating, the container it's only filled half way. What a rip off. I wouldn't mind posting a picture but that option isn't include on the review.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: it is very very little amount.
customer_reviews.text: you are gonna be surprised about the amount of the products. The box of the powder is less than half the size of the original one, but the powder is not even half of the box. it is definitely less than the last time I purchased it. I am not sure about how healthy it is but tasty is good.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: So Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers are right, this is ridiculously sweet. By itself, the sweetness is just too much. I've added it to protein shakes and smoothies, and that makes it a little more palatable. I'll finish what I have, but I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaia

customer_reviews.title: He is stationed overseas and said the fruit is not good. He loves this product
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for greens to be added to his smoothies. He is stationed overseas and said the fruit is not good. He loves this product! No taste when added to smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: denisek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for your health and full of goodness
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily as a supplement. I enjoy it with a little honey and drink it hot like a tea. It has improved my overall health. My skin and hair look and feel healthier. I feel the difference in my energy levels. And it is visibly noticeable in my appearance. I have recommended and order this product for my loved ones
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: My new breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to reduce my cereal intake. Now, I use a scoop of the powder, a handful of frozen fruit and almond milk. Blend it up and off you go. It takes just a minute. Tastes great. Texture perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: Not actually made of mostly greens
customer_reviews.text: This product description as being comprised of greens is very misleading when you actually look at the principal ingredients. The first two ingredients are rice flour and whole grains blend, then there is inulin which is a non-nutritive fiber, then flaxseed also mostly a fiber. Ingredients also contain garbanzo adzuki etcetera , wheat grass, which are common allergens and can cause digestive upset for example through breast milk for infants.
customer_reviews.author: e boxer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product kind of tastes like really Bland green beans I just use less water and the same amount of powder just to drink a quicker good product though
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not into the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of veggies and fruits in this. But the flavor and thickness are not that great. I drink it with water. Would prob be better made in a shake.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet for my liking
customer_reviews.text: This is so sweet! It's like drinking sugar...it does not taste healthy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Delroy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dissolve in water
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t dissolve in water at all. Taste is a little too sweet. Makes me wonder what has been added to the powder to make it so sweet. I’ve tried a different brand which dissolves in water and doesn’t taste sweet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Engine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, has a kind of green organic taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, has a kind of green organic taste that blends to a okay flavor with chocolate whey protein. My only complaint is that the width of the container opening is too small so my average size man hands can't reach into it when the power goes low. In fact, it just happened a minute ago which is what lead me to writing this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green drank
customer_reviews.text: The container was a bit smaller than I imagined it would be, but as long as I get 23-24 servings out of it! The flavor is sweet and there's no smell, but its quite tasty! I'd rather have it taste sweet than horrible! Good product
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We mix it into juice and it doesn't effect the flavor much. It is a little grainy but not bad. My kids gobble it down, so no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy organic food source
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to health food store brands. Good in a smoothie with protein base. Proceed carefully when using concentrated powders; please follow directions, using included scoop to dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria White Doe

customer_reviews.title: Keep a Bathroom Close
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gave me terrible diarrhea every time I drank it. I'm not aware of having any food allergies, but I guess it's possible. But this stuff would absolutely ruin my day every time I drank it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L

customer_reviews.title: What does one do if they don't like vegetables? Everyone needs a certain amount of vegetables ...
customer_reviews.text: Still getting use to the idea of getting vegetables from a jar. What does one do if they don't like vegetables? Everyone needs a certain amount of vegetables to maintain a nutritional balance. I guess this method is a good start. After taking product for a couple weeks; I could actually tell a difference in how my body processes what I consume. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Musclebound

product_meta.title: Purely Inspired Organic Greens Powder, 39 Superfoods + Multivitamins, Healthy Nutrition on the Go, Fruits + Vegetables + Probiotics, 18 Vitamins & Minerals, Vegan, Gluten Free, Non-GMO (24 Servings)
product_meta.description: Purely Inspired USDA Certified Organic greens supplies you with an ultra clean formula that contains no artificial sweeteners, colors or dyes to ensure you are only getting the highest quality superfoods and multivitamins. This convenient greens powder can be added to smoothies, soups or sauces. 100 percent vegan friendly and non GMO its an excellent way to add key greens to your daily diet.
feature_bullets: FROM AMERICA’s #1 FASTEST GROWING SUPPLEMENT BRAND – Purely Inspired Organic Greens Powder delivers 39 superfoods with just 1 scoop. 40 Calories per serving
CLEAN INGREDIENTS – Certified USDA Organic, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Vegan Friendly. No artificial sweeteners, colors or flavors

EASY TO USE – Mix in a glass or shaker bottle with water, juice, smoothies (with Purely Inspired Organic Protein), almond milk, oat milk or your non-dairy drink of choice. Organic Greens can also be added to soups and sauces
CONVENIENT – It’s a simple way to add superfoods, greens, grains, sprouts, fruits and veggies to your day with just one serving. Healthy essential nutrition on the go for women and men
ANTIOXIDANTS – Contains antioxidant vitamins C and E

ORGANIC INGREDIENTS – Banana, Tomato, Beet, Sweet Potato, Strawberry, Broccoli, Spinach, Carrot, Cherry, Apple, Pineapple, Whole Grains, Radish Sprout, Alfalfa, Chia, Pumpkin, Sunflower, Lentil, Garbanzo, Flaxseed, Quinoa, Wheatgrass and many more

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
